uk.co.greedygull.entities

Class Entity

  • Object
    • Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ammo, Enemy, Food, Player, PlayerShadow, Target

    public abstract class Entity
extends Object
    This class is inherited by all other entities and defines the constructors,render method and operations.
    Author:
    Matej

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Rectangle getBounds()
      Creates and returns a rectangle bounding box used for collision detection.
      Vector2 getDirection()
      Returns the protected vector2 Direction direction
      float getHeight()
      Returns the height of the entity based on its texture height
      Vector2 getPosition()
      Returns the protected vector2 Position pos
      float getWidth()
      Returns the width of the entity based on its texture width
